Rulings.Edison:
●The Condition can't be negated.
●Dark Ruler Ha Des Cannot be Special Summoned face-down by The Shallow Grave.
●Dark Ruler Ha Des can be Special Summoned by Return from the Different Dimension.
●The ●This effect can't be negated by Divine Wrath, but CAN be negated by Skill Drain.
●This effect does not apply if Zombie World changes to your Fiend-Types into Zombie-Types.
●Monster destroyed by battle are marked for destruction at the end of Damage Calculation.
●Effects that activate in Substep 5 - After Damage Calculation are negated.
●Effects that activate in Substep 6 - Resolve Effects are negated (ex: Ryko, Lightsworn Hunter and D.D. Warrior Lady).
●Effects that activate in Substep 7 - End of the Damage Step are negated (ex: Mystic Tomato).
●Effects that activate in the GY are negated; such as Treeborn Frog, Plaguespreader Zombie, Sinister Serpent. The negation is reset if these cards are removed from the GY.
●This effect does not affect monsters destroyed as substitutes such as Six Samurai monsters, or if Relinquished would be destroyed by battle while equipped with Sangan.
●If your Dark Ruler Ha Des or other Fiend-Type monster destroys Tyrant Dragon as a result of battle, a Dragon-Type monster must still be Tributed when Tyrant Dragon is Special Summoned from the GY. This is because Tributing a Dragon-Type monster is a condition on the Summoning of the card; it is not part of the effect. For the same reason, if a Spirit Monster is destroyed by a Fiend-Type monster when Dark Ruler Ha Des is on the field, it still Cannot be Special Summoned from the GY. Also if two Dark Ruler Ha Des destroy each other in battle, neither can be Special Summoned from the GY.
Rulings.Tengu:
(C) This card cannot be Special Summoned from the GY. (1) Negate the effects of Effect Monsters destroyed by battle with Fiend-Type monsters you control.
●The (C) Condition cannot be negated.
●Dark Ruler Ha Des cannot be Special Summoned face-down by The Shallow Grave.
●Dark Ruler Ha Des can be Special Summoned by Return from the Different Dimension.
●The (1) Continuous Effect does not activate. It also applies to Ha Des.
●This effect CANNOT be negated by Divine Wrath, but CAN be negated by Skill Drain.
●This effect does not apply if Zombie World changes to your Fiend-Types into Zombie-Types.
●Monster destroyed by battle are marked for destruction at the end of Damage Calculation.
●Effects that activate in Substep 5 - After Damage Calculation are negated.
●Effects that activate in Substep 6 - Resolve Effects are negated (ex: Ryko, Lightsworn Hunter and D.D. Warrior Lady).
●Effects that activate in Substep 7 - End of the Damage Step are negated (ex: Mystic Tomato).
●Effects that activate in the GY are negated; such as Treeborn Frog, Plaguespreader Zombie, Sinister Serpent. The negation is reset if these cards are removed from the GY.
●This effect does not affect monsters destroyed as substitutes such as Six Samurai monsters, or if Relinquished would be destroyed by battle while equipped with Sangan.
●If your Dark Ruler Ha Des or other Fiend-Type monster destroys Tyrant Dragon as a result of battle, a Dragon-Type monster must still be Tributed when Tyrant Dragon is Special Summoned from the GY. This is because Tributing a Dragon-Type monster is a condition on the Summoning of the card; it is not part of the effect. For the same reason, if a Spirit Monster is destroyed by a Fiend-Type monster when Dark Ruler Ha Des is on the field, it still cannot be Special Summoned from the GY. Also if two Dark Ruler Ha Des destroy each other in battle, neither can be Special Summoned from the GY.
Rulings.Goat:
This card’s effect includes itself, as long as it remains a Fiend.
Flip Effects and effects that activate in the GY WILL be negated. This includes Sinister Serpent, Sangan, Witch of the Black Forest, Marie the Fallen One, ...
Monster effects that activate after damage calculation will be negated if your Fiend destroys the opposing Effect Monster. 
If an Effect Monster, destroyed by a Fiend while Dark Ruler Ha Des is on the field, is returned from the GY to the hand or Special Summoned from the GY, its effect will be active again. Its effect may be negated again if destroyed by Dark Ruler Ha Des or another Fiend.
If one of these Effect Monsters is removed from play (by Soul Release for example) and then returned to the GY with Miracle Dig, the negation condition was lost and the effects will now be active.
If Kisetai is attacked by a Fiend while Dark Ruler Ha Des is on the field, its effect prevents damage calculation, so it is not destroyed and its effect is NOT negated.
If Sinister Serpent, Twin-Headed Behemoth, or Marie the Fallen One is destroyed by a Fiend when this card is on the field, they will not activate on any following turn. So during your opponent’s next Standby Phase, and each of his/her following Standby Phases, they may NOT move Sinister Serpent to their hand, Special Summon Twin-Headed Behemoth, and they will NOT gain Life Points by the effect of Marie the Fallen One. This negation continues even if Dark Ruler Ha Des is later removed from the field. (continues)
Rulings.HAT: No rulings found for this card. Request new rulings at https://discord.gg/shVJnYJNpg
Rulings.Vegas: No rulings found for this card. Request new rulings at https://discord.gg/shVJnYJNpg
Rulings.Meadowlands: No rulings found for this card. Request new rulings at https://discord.gg/shVJnYJNpg
Rulings.FireWater: No rulings found for this card. Request new rulings at https://discord.gg/shVJnYJNpg
Rulings.Cat:
● This card’s effect includes itself, as long as it remains a Fiend.
● Flip Effects and effects that activate in the GY WILL be negated. This includes 'Sinister Serpent', 'Sangan', 'Witch of the Black Forest', 'Marie the Fallen One', 'Mystic Tomato', 'Giant Rat', 'Masked Dragon', 'Magician of Faith', 'Man-Eater Bug', 'Nimble Momonga', 'Twin-Headed Behemoth', etc.
● Monster effects that activate after damage calculation will be negated if your Fiend destroys the opposing Effect Monster. Examples include 'D.D. Warrior Lady', 'Thousand Needles', 'Slate Warrior', 'Ryu Kokki', and 'Wall of Illusion'.
● If an Effect Monster, destroyed by a Fiend while 'Dark Ruler Ha Des' is on the field, is returned from the GY to the hand or Special Summoned from the GY, its effect will be applying again. Its effect may be negated again if destroyed by 'Dark Ruler Ha Des' or another Fiend.
● If one of these Effect Monsters is removed from play (by 'Soul Release' for example) and then returned to the GY with 'Miracle Dig', the negation condition was lost and the effects will now be applying.
● If 'Kisetai' is attacked by a Fiend while 'Dark Ruler Ha Des' is on the field, its effect prevents damage calculation, so it isn't destroyed and its effect is NOT negated.
● If 'Sinister Serpent', 'Twin-Headed Behemoth', or 'Marie the Fallen One' is destroyed by a Fiend when this card is on the field, they will not activate on any following turn. So during your opponent’s next Standby Phase, and each of his/her following Standby Phases, they may NOT move 'Sinister Serpent' to their hand, Special Summon 'Twin-Headed Behemoth', and they will NOT gain LP by the effect of 'Marie the Fallen One'. This negation continues even if 'Dark Ruler Ha Des' is later removed from the field.
● If your Fiend battles with 'Relinquished' equipped with a 'Sangan' or a 'Witch of the Black Forest' and the equipped card is destroyed instead of 'Relinquished', the effect of 'Sangan', etc., will activate since it was the effect of 'Relinquished' that destroyed it. It was not destroyed as a result of battle with the Fiend.
● If your 'Dark Ruler Ha Des' or other Fiend destroys 'Tyrant Dragon' as a result of battle, a Dragon must still be Tributed when 'Tyrant Dragon' is Special Summoned from the GY. This is because Tributing a Dragon is a condition on the Summoning of the card; it isn't part of the effect. For the same reason, if a Spirit Monster is destroyed by a Fiend when 'Dark Ruler Ha Des' is on the field, it still can't be Special Summoned from the GY. Also if two 'Dark Ruler Ha Des' destroy each other in battle, neither can be Special Summoned from the GY.
● 'Dark Ruler Ha Des' can't be Special Summoned from the GY even if you try to Special Summon it face-down by the effect of 'Spear Cretin' or 'The Shallow Grave'.
● You can activate 'Return of the Doomed' to return 'Dark Ruler Ha Des' to your hand during the turn which it was destroyed, because this does not Special Summon it, it merely returns the card to your hand.
● The effect of 'Fiber Jar' will shuffle 'Dark Ruler Ha Des' back into your Deck even if 'Dark Ruler Ha Des' is in the GY and can't be Special Summoned.
● 'Dark Ruler Ha Des' may be Special Summoned by 'Dimension Fusion' or 'Return from the Different Dimension' if it was removed from play.

Rulings.Base:
1. This card's effect includes itself, as long as it remains a Fiend-Type monster.
2. Flip Effects and effects that activate in the GY WILL be negated. This includes "Sinister Serpent", "Sangan", "Witch of the Black Forest", "Marie the Fallen One", "Mystic Tomato", "Giant Rat", "Masked Dragon", "Magician of Faith", "Man-Eater Bug", "Nimble Momonga", "Twin-Headed Behemoth", etc.
3. Monster effects that activate after damage calculation will be negated if your Fiend-Type monster destroys the opposing Effect Monster. Examples include "D.D. Warrior Lady", "Thousand Needles", "Slate Warrior", "Ryu Kokki", and "Wall of Illusion".
4. If an Effect Monster, destroyed by a Fiend-Type monster while "Dark Ruler Ha Des" is on the field, is returned from the GY to the hand or Special Summoned from the GY, its effect will be active again. Its effect may be negated again if destroyed by "Dark Ruler Ha Des" or another Fiend-Type monster.
5. If one of these Effect Monsters is removed from play (by "Soul Release" for example) and then returned to the GY with "Miracle Dig", the negation condition was lost and the effects will now be active.
6. If "Kisetai" is attacked by a Fiend-Type monster while "Dark Ruler Ha Des" is on the field, its effect prevents damage calculation, so it is not destroyed and its effect is NOT negated.
7. If "Sinister Serpent", "Twin-Headed Behemoth", or "Marie the Fallen One" is destroyed by a Fiend-Type monster when this card is on the field, they will not activate on any following turn. So during your opponent's next Standby Phase, and each of his/her following Standby Phases, they may NOT move "Sinister Serpent" to their hand, Special Summon "Twin-Headed Behemoth", and they will NOT gain Life Points by the effect of "Marie the Fallen One". This negation continues even if "Dark Ruler Ha Des" is later removed from the field.
8. If your Fiend-Type monster battles with "Relinquished" equipped with a "Sangan" or a "Witch of the Black Forest" and the equipped card is destroyed instead of "Relinquished", the effect of "Sangan", etc., will activate since it was the effect of "Relinquished" that destroyed it. It was not destroyed as a result of battle with the Fiend-Type monster.
9. If your "Dark Ruler Ha Des" or other Fiend-Type monster destroys "Tyrant Dragon" as a result of battle, a Dragon-Type monster must still be Tributed when "Tyrant Dragon" is Special Summoned from the GY. This is because Tributing a Dragon-Type monster is a condition on the Summoning of the card; it is not part of the effect. For the same reason, if a Spirit Monster is destroyed by a Fiend-Type monster when "Dark Ruler Ha Des" is on the field, it still cannot be Special Summoned from the GY. Also if two "Dark Ruler Ha Des" destroy each other in battle, neither can be Special Summoned from the GY.
10. "Dark Ruler Ha Des" cannot be Special Summoned from the GY even if you try to Special Summon it face-down by the effect of "Spear Cretin" or "The Shallow Grave".
11. You can activate "Return of the Doomed" to return "Dark Ruler Ha Des" to your hand during the turn which it was destroyed, because this does not Special Summon it, it merely returns the card to your hand.
12. The effect of "Fiber Jar" will shuffle "Dark Ruler Ha Des" back into your Deck even if "Dark Ruler Ha Des" is in the GY and cannot be Special Summoned.
13. "Dark Ruler Ha Des" may be Special Summoned by "Dimension Fusion" or "Return from the Different Dimension" if it was removed from play.
